actions.name: local-install
actions.command: VERSION=$(grep -E '^version = "' pyproject.toml | cut -d'"' -f2); pipx install dist/atils-$VERSION.tar.gz --force

actions.name: docker-build-and-push
actions.command: VERSION=$(grep -E '^version = "' pyproject.toml | cut -d'"' -f2); docker build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 -t "aidanhilt/atils:$VERSION" -t "aidanhilt/atils:latest" --push .

action_sets.name: validate
action_sets.description: Runs code quality checks and tests

action_sets.name: local-install
action_sets.description: Builds and installs atils locally, for testing purposes

action_sets.name: ci-build-publish
action_sets.description: Builds and publishes atils to Docker Hub, as well as PyPI
